content.text:
Here is my response formatted as requested:

<OUTPUT_TEXT>

# Referring Unresolved Customer Grievances

1. Assess the grievance
- Determine if the issue is truly unresolved
- Identify which department is best suited to handle it

2. Document the grievance details
- Record customer information and complaint specifics
- Note previous attempts to resolve the issue

3. Select appropriate department
- Choose based on nature of complaint (e.g. billing, technical support)
- Consult internal directory if unsure

4. Prepare referral
- Summarize key details of the grievance
- Include relevant customer history and account information

5. Submit formal referral
- Use designated system or form for interdepartmental requests
- Mark as high priority if urgent

6. Notify the customer
- Explain that their case is being escalated
- Provide estimated timeframe for follow-up

7. Track the referral
- Monitor status of transferred grievance
- Follow up with department if no update received

8. Close the loop
- Confirm resolution with referred department
- Contact customer to ensure satisfaction

</OUTPUT_TEXT>
